Lymph nodes    For cancer that may have spread to lymph nodes, treatment may include the following:         -  Radiation therapy and/or surgery (neck dissection).    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy and radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy before or after surgery.    - A clinical trial of hyperfractionated radiation therapy.
